name: Car Scene Puzzle
description:
Car Scene Puzzle is the most popular sliding block puzzle game. The goal of this game is to get a red car out of a six-by-six grid full of automobiles by moving the other vehicles out of its way.
Features:
- Four difficulty levels – easy, medium, hard, expert
- Many puzzles for you to enjoy
- 4 different visually striking themes
- Quick and easy Tutorial
- System to help you undo the game
- Background music and sounds
